thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wavestone: Q1 Consolidated Revenue at EUR 85.4 Mln, Confirms FY Outlook

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wavestone: Q1 Consolidated Revenue at EUR 85.4 Mln, Confirms FY Outlook
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - WAVESTONE SA:
* ANNOUNCED ON SATURDAY Q1 CONSOLIDATED REVENUE OF EUR 85.4 MLN VS EUR 88.4 YR AGO
* Q1 ACTIVITY RATE OF 76 PCT * CONFIRMS ITS 2017/18 ANNUAL TARGETS: ACHIEVE FY REVENUE OF MORE THAN EUR 350 MLN, WITH DOUBLE-DIGIT CURRENT OPERATING MARGIN, EXCLUDING NEW ACQUISITION
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
